title: Michael (Khoroshy)
summary: Metropolitan Michael, (secular name Theodot Nykyforovych Khoroshy; 10 July 1885, in Fyodorovka, near Chigirin, Russian Empire (now in Ukraine) – May 5, 1977, in Toronto) was a bishop of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church of Canada from 1951–1977, and the Church's Metropolitan from 1973 until his resignation in 1975.
